name: Bulbasaur
description: Bulbasaur can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back.

name: Charmander
description: Charmander's flame on the tip of its tail indicates its life force.

name: Squirtle
description: Squirtle's shell helps it minimize damage from attacks.

name: Pikachu
description: Pikachu generates electricity in the electric pouches on its cheeks.

name: Jigglypuff
description: Jigglypuff's songs put people to sleep with a gentle melody.

name: Meowth
description: Meowth loves anything that shines. It wanders the streets looking for loose change.

name: Psyduck
description: Psyduck suffers frequent headaches, making it unable to think clearly.

name: Machop
description: Machop trains by lifting Gravelers every day.

name: Geodude
description: Geodude climbs mountain paths using its arms.

name: Eevee
description: Eevee has an unstable genetic makeup that suddenly mutates due to the environment.

name: Snorlax
description: Snorlax eats nearly 900 pounds of food every day.

name: Mewtwo
description: Mewtwo was created by recombining Mew's genes and is known for its psychic abilities.

name: Oddish
description: Oddish grows by absorbing moonlight. During the day, it buries itself in the ground.

name: Vulpix
description: Vulpix's six beautiful tails gain more warmth as it matures.

name: Growlithe
description: Growlithe has a keen sense of smell and will never forget any scent.

name: Abra
description: Abra sleeps 18 hours a day, using telepathy to sense danger while sleeping.

name: Gengar
description: Gengar is said to emerge from shadows to steal the lives of those who become lost in the mountains.

name: Onix
description: Onix burrows underground at high speeds and can create tunnels as it goes.

name: Lapras
description: Lapras ferries people across bodies of water with its gentle temperament.

name: Magikarp
description: Magikarp is virtually useless in battle but evolves into the powerful Gyarados.

name: Rhyhorn
description: Rhyhorn charges in a straight line, smashing everything in its path.

name: Jynx
description: Jynx's weird forms of communication sound similar to human speech.

name: Gardevoir
description: Gardevoir has the ability to see the future. It is known for its loyalty to its Trainer.

name: Lucario
description: Lucario can read the feelings of people. It is known for its fighting prowess and aura abilities.

name: Cyndaquil
description: Cyndaquil is a fire Pokémon that is shy and hides its flame when it is frightened.

name: Lapras
description: Lapras ferries people across bodies of water with its gentle temperament.

name: Dragonite
description: Dragonite can fly faster than the speed of sound and is known for its intelligence.

name: Froslass
description: Froslass is known to lure unwary travelers into the snowy mountains with its icy touch.

name: Zoroark
description: Zoroark can create illusions to mislead opponents. It is known for its cleverness.

name: Greninja
description: Greninja is known for its swift movements and ninja-like skills in battle.

name: Togepi
description: Togepi is known to bring happiness to those who care for it. It evolves into Togetic when it gains enough happiness.

name: Lucario
description: Lucario can read the feelings of people and is known for its fighting prowess and aura abilities.

name: Chespin
description: Chespin is a Grass-type Pokémon that is known for its tough exterior and is always ready for an adventure.

name: Fletchinder
description: Fletchinder can soar through the skies at incredible speeds and is known for its fiery personality.

name: Bagon
description: Bagon dreams of flying and is known to ram its head into rocks to try to grow wings.

name: Sylveon
description: Sylveon is known for its ability to soothe others with its ribbons. It evolves from Eevee when it has a high friendship.

name: Goomy
description: Goomy is known to be the weakest Dragon-type Pokémon, but it is also very cute and friendly.

name: Salamence
description: Salamence is the result of Bagon evolving and is known for its incredible flying speed and strength.

name: Tyranitar
description: Tyranitar is a massive Pokémon that is said to create mountains when it becomes enraged.

name: Shaymin
description: Shaymin can transform between two forms and is known for its ability to purify the air around it.

name: Cobalion
description: Cobalion is known as the leader of the Swords of Justice and is admired for its courage and strength.

name: Piplup
description: Piplup is proud and dislikes to be taken care of. It can swim very well despite its small size.

name: Zubat
description: Zubat is known to be a common sight in caves and uses echolocation to navigate.

name: Alakazam
description: Alakazam has an IQ of 5000 and can use its psychic powers to create powerful psychic waves.

name: Sableye
description: Sableye is known for its mischievous nature and can blend into the shadows to avoid detection.

name: Mimikyu
description: Mimikyu hides its true appearance under a disguise to befriend people and Pokémon.

name: Torterra
description: Torterra is a massive Pokémon that creates forests on its back as it walks.

name: Ferrothorn
description: Ferrothorn is known for its steel-like body and can withstand attacks with its tough defenses.

name: Dragapult
description: Dragapult can launch its Dreepy from its head at high speeds, making it a fearsome attacker.

name: Hawlucha
description: Hawlucha is known for its acrobatic fighting style, blending lucha libre wrestling with speed.

name: Cacturne
description: Cacturne is a cactus Pokémon that thrives in deserts and can survive without water for long periods.
